roleset.name: using/capable of clear, effective language
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, close relation to 'articulate-v'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Michael Atherton is a superb commentator as he is articulate , amusing and very knowledgeable and I wish that they would make him the front man and pension off Mr Gower .

example.name: both args
example.text: A successful Art Practice graduate is articulate about his/her work, and has an understanding of the professional landscape he/she is entering.
